title: Chapter 949 - Boating At Night On The Sea Of Bitterness
body:
Chapter 949 - Boating At Night On The Sea Of Bitterness

The mysterious Netherworld Vessel had appeared once more!

This news swept through the City of Safe Returns like a tidal wave. People were discussing it all over the city.

There was no need for Su Yi to investigate; just listening to the commotion on the streets was enough for him to understand the full story.

That very day, a group of cultivators had returned from the far reaches of the Sea of Bitterness, and they brought stunning news back with them.

Apparently, three nights prior, the Netherworld Vessel had appeared out of nowhere near a place called Flowing Sand Island.

The cultivators gathering Profound Gem Metal Sand on Flowing Sand Island all disappeared inexplicably.

By the time others discovered what had happened, all they found on Flowing Sand Island was a bit of hastily scrawled text.

Its contents were about the Netherworld Vessel’s sudden appearance!

This was why everyone inferred that the cultivators’ inexplicable disappearance was connected to the Netherworld Vessel!

“Flowing Sand Island… that’s one of the most dangerous places in the Sea of Bitterness. It’s home to too many Ocean Soul Serpents, and they’re lethally venomous.

“But it’s a treasure ground too. If you’re lucky, you can gather a rare divine material,...
original_title: Chapter 949 - Boating at Night on the Sea of Bitterness
